Text: indextrance aka segalboy could you possibly split the tracks of gareth emery's podcast.  If you do that, your No. 1.  By the way, no one splits and seperates tracks like you, thanks and keep up the good work

Thanks for those kind words! 

Anyway, regarding 'The Gareth Emery Podcast' .. It's a podcast only released @ 128 kbps .. 'International Departures Podcast' releases in 320 instead and don't know why he have such a low bitrate on his podcast .. 

Do you really want this show to be weekly updated anyway? (Just asking) ; )

Thanks a lot IndexTrance!!

TRANCE FOR EVER!
